name: Star Brawler
description:
You are a Retronian ship stranded in uncharted space and your weapons system was destroyed. Use your ship's robotic tentacles to fight your way through a series increasingly difficult enemies. 

Use WASD or your arrow keys to move. 
Press X for a basic attack, or Z for a more powerful spin attack. 
Press C to grab an enemy and Z again to throw him at your foes.
